pullrequest.title: Added gui-client-plugin option. Leave -g to load System Plugins (issue #2279)

content.raw:
@asymingt we added another command-line option here to distinguish between `GUIPlugin`s and `SystemPlugin`s:

* `--gui-client-plugin` for `GUIPlugin`s
* `--gui-plugin` or `-g` for `SystemPlugin`s

I think it should still work to load a SystemPlugin in gzclient if you use `-g`
content.html:
@asymingt we added another command-line option here to distinguish between GUIPlugins and SystemPlugins:

  • --gui-client-plugin for GUIPlugins
  • --gui-plugin or -g for SystemPlugins

I think it should still work to load a SystemPlugin in gzclient if you use -g
